snippet: The construction companies working to widen the Panama Canal and the waterway’s administrator each made new proposals aimed at ending a dispute over $1.6 billion in cost overruns.
abstract: Construction companies working to widen Panama Canal and waterway’s administrator each make new proposals aimed at ending dispute over $1.6 billion in cost overruns.
lead_paragraph: The construction companies working to widen the Panama Canal and the waterway’s administrator each made new proposals aimed at ending a dispute over $1.6 billion in cost overruns.

headline.main: Dispute Over Costs Halts Panama Canal Expansion
headline.print_headline: Dispute Over Costs Halts Panama Canal Expansion
